item.description:
We had eleven (11) fun and friendly people and just one (this time) that didn't know how to play and Melody said she would come back because we were so outgoing and friendly and she understood cribbage now!! And she even beat JOE ! ! Even though Larry skunked them both.
Micki couldn't find the yodeling pickle to sing to Joe for that ^ ^

And we had Laurie who was new but did already know how to play cribbage and enjoyed losing to both Dave and Micki :)

And all the usual wonderful people who always come and enjoy and always have F*U*N. And kudos to Karen for taking over Gabe who lost to Micki also.

Emad celebrated his birthday early and got skunked by Micki - OH NO, anything but that...
And Teresa who was her always gracious self and came up to the plate again filling in where needed (thank you always) !

A big Thank You for the Coffee and especially scrumptious Chocolate Chip Cookies from the Cafe. Unbelievably delicious!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage - Have Fun Between the IDES and the IRISH !!
